articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Headquarters of People's Security Ministry
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Headquarters of People's Security Ministry
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the headquarters of the Ministry of People's Security.
					 He was greeted on the spot by Ju Sang Song, member of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Security, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Department of the ministry, and other commanding officers of the ministry.
					
					 After receiving a salute, he went round the room for technological research and other places to acquaint himself in detail with the ministry's performance of duty.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all commanding officers and public security persons of the ministry have performed their duties in a responsible manner, deeply aware of the sense of their honorable mission as the first line unit in the class struggle and the interior force of the Party and praised the efforts made by them.
					
					 The interior force having the more than six decade-long brilliant tradition of devotedly defending the leader has reliably protected the gains of the socialist country and the peace of the people by standing firm guard over the outpost of the class struggle, thus making great contributions to the prosperity and development of the country, he noted, highly estimating the shining exploits performed by them in the past.
					
					 Our socialist country is sure to win as the defence line of the country is defended as firm as an invulnerable fortress by the heroic KPA which has grown to be a-match-for-a-hundred ranks and the security of the country and its people is reliably protected by the interior force intensely loyal to the Party and the leader, the country and its people, he stressed.
					
					 Expressing the expectation and conviction that the public security persons, the political defenders of the Party and vanguard fighters in the class struggle, would protect the gains of the revolution and lives and properties of the people with their lives in the future, too, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further increasing the combat capability of the interior force.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, member of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the C.C., the WPK, and its other leading officials.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Servicepersons Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Servicepersons Art Performance
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by soldiers of a company under KPA Unit 147.
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Cry of Magpie in Military Post", narrative and song "Happiness of Being under Care of the Respected General", vocal solo "Soldiers Live Near the General", poem recitation "My Country", instrumental concert "My Country Is So Nice", chorus "Yebbuni" and other numbers of diverse genres.
					
					 The performers highly sang of the worthwhile military service life during which they are enjoying all kinds of happiness under the benevolent loving care of Kim Jong Il. They also strikingly demonstrated the might of the heroic KPA which has grown to be the invincible army and the iron faith and will and the militant spirit of all the servicepersons determined to readily become fortress and shield in devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly praised the successful performance and extended thanks to the performers, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the soldiers of the company gave a excellent performance with works of various themes truthfully reflecting their life.
					
					 Noting that all the servicepersons have been prepared as men of idea and faith and grown to be resolute revolutionaries and fighters of Songun possessed of high cultural knowledge, he stressed: Our socialist motherland is impregnable as such reliable a-match-for-a hundred fighters are guarding the outpost of the country.
					
					 He set forth important tasks that would serve as guidelines in intensifying the art activities at all units including company.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC and first vice-director of the KPA General Political Bureau, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, and other commanding officers of the army, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, department directors, first vice department directors and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Workers Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Workers Art Performance
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by members of the itinerant art squads of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, the Taean Heavy Machine Complex and the Tobacco Complex and the art circle of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers of diverse genres as chorus "We Are the Happiest in the World", poem and story "We Will Inherit the Revolutionary Spirit of Mt. Paektu Forever", mixed chorus "Push Back the Frontiers of Science", drum-accompanied singing in unison "Korea Advances, Holding the Red Flag", story and agitation "The Year of Great Changes" and drum and chorus "Let Us Uphold Our General".
					
					 The performers strikingly demonstrated the militant spirit of the heroic Korean workers who are dashing headlong toward the eminence of a thriving nation full of confidence in sure victory and optimism and well represented the proud picture of the working class' new culture created in the Songun era.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the successful performance given by the workers of industrial establishments, a performance perfect in ideological contents and artistry with art works of weighty cognitive and educational significance truthfully reflecting their life.
					
					 He gave a high appreciation of the fact that the itinerant art squad and art circle members have briskly conducted mass art activities in the thick of seething reality to inspiringly encourage the party members and other workers to working new miracles and feats, and extended thanks to all the performers.
					
					 In the course of protracted and arduous struggle the heroic Korean working class has fully demonstrated its dignity as the ranks faithful to the idea and guidance of the party and the leader and as the core force of the revolution resolutely adhering to the socialist principle with the steadfast stand for independence against imperialism, he said, adding: A great prosperous and powerful nation is sure to be built as such dependable working class creditably takes the lead in a drive for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					  He set forth highly important tasks to be fulfilled in intensifying the mass cultural art activities.
					
					Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, department directors and first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee and leading officials of the industrial establishments concerned.

articles.title: Chinese Defense Minister Here
articles.content:
Chinese Defense Minister Here
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Col. General Liang Guanglie, minister of National Defense who doubles as a state councilor of the People's Republic of China, arrived here by air on Sunday.
					 He was accompanied by Col. General Huang Xianzhong, political commissar of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, Lieu. General Feng Zhaoju, deputy commander of the Jinan Military Area, Vice Admiral  Xu Hongmeng, deputy commander of the Nanjing Military Area and commander of the East Sea Fleet of the Navy, Lieu. General Jiang Jianzeng, deputy commander of the Nanjing Military Area and commander of the Air Force of the area, Maj. General Chai Shaoliang, organizational director of the General Political Department of the CPLA, Maj. General Wang Jin, vice-director of the Operation Department of the General Staff, Maj. General Jia Xiaoning, deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, and other suite members.
					
					 Liang Guanglie issued an arrival statement.
					
					 A welcome function took place in front of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower.
					
					 Present there were Liang Guanglie and his party, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming, Military, Naval and Air Attache Sun Yanfeng and staff members of the Chinese embassy, and Chinese guests and students staying in the DPRK.
					
					 On hand were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, other generals and officers of the KPA.
					
					 Liang Guanglie, together with Kim Yong Chun, reviewed a KPA guard of honor.

articles.title: Kim Yong Chun Meets Chinese Defense Minister
articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun Meets Chinese Defense Minister
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, met with Col. General Liang Guanglie, minister of National Defense who doubles as a state councilor of the People's Republic of China, on Sunday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
					 Present there were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Col. General of the KPA Sim Sang Dae, Lieu. General of the KPA Kim Su Hak and other generals and officers of the KPA.
					
					 On hand were Col. General Huang Xianzhong, political commissar of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, Lieu. General Feng Zhaoju, deputy commander of the Jinan Military Area, Vice Admiral  Xu Hongmeng, deputy commander of the Nanjing Military Area and commander of the East Sea Fleet of the Navy, Lieu. General Jiang Jianzeng, deputy commander of the Nanjing Military Area and commander of the Air Force of the area, Maj. General Chai Shaoliang, organizational director of the General Political Department of the CPLA, Maj. General Wang Jin, vice-director of the Operation Department of the General Staff, Maj. General Jia Xiaoning, deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, and other suite members and Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the embassy. 
					
					 Kim Yong Chun warmly congratulated Liang Guanglie on his visit to the DPRK and had a talk with him in a comradely and friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Defense Minister
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Defense Minister
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Col. General Liang Guanglie, minister of National Defense who doubles as a state councilor of the People's Republic of China, and his party on a visit to the DPRK.
					It was handed to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Sunday.

articles.title: Chinese Defense Minister Feted
articles.content:
Chinese Defense Minister Feted
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The People's Armed Forces of the DPRK arranged a reception on Sunday in honor of the visiting minister of National Defense of China.
					 Present there on invitation were Col. General Liang Guanglie, minister of National Defense who doubles as a state councilor of the People's Republic of China, and his party and Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and the military, naval and air attache of his embassy.
					
					 On hand were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Yong Chun said at the reception: The visit to the DPRK by the Chinese defense minister will be of support and encouragement to the Korean army and people in the efforts to build a thriving nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il, and mark an important occasion in promoting the development of the traditional relations of friendship between the armies of the two countries.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK-China friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung together with the Chinese leaders of elder generation has been strengthened under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 It is the fixed stand of the Korean army and people to invariably consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendship which has stood all trials of history, he said.
					
					 He noted that the Chinese army and people have made great successes in building a harmonious socialist society based on the scientific outlook on development under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Hu Jintao as its general secretary.
					
					 He heartily wished the Chinese army and people bigger successes in their efforts to build socialism of Chinese characteristics.
					
					 Liang Guanglie said in his speech that they came to the DPRK, a friendly neighbor, with the warm friendship of the people and army of China toward the people and army of the DPRK. He expressed deep thanks for cordial hospitality accorded to them.
					
					 He noted that he witnessed for himself the Sino-DPRK friendly relations sealed in blood while staying in the DPRK as a soldier of the Chinese People's Volunteers more than 50 years ago.                                                   
					
					 No force on earth can break the unity of the armies and peoples of the two countries and it will last forever, he noted.
					
					 He recalled that the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations which have steadily grown strong thanks to the efforts of the two sides have contributed to positively promoting socialist construction in the two countries and defending peace and stability in the region.
					
					We are pleased with the great achievements made by the people and army of the DPRK in the building of a thriving nation in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il and the Workers' Party of Korea, he noted.
					
					 It is the desire of the two peoples to further consolidate and develop the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, he said, adding: We will make positive efforts to do so with Korean comrades.

articles.title: Chairman of Russian Federation Council to Visit DPRK
articles.content:
Chairman of Russian Federation Council to Visit DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Sergei Mikhailovich Mironov, chairman of the Federation Council of Russia, will soon visit the DPRK at the invitation of its Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Reactionary Nature of Capitalist Society
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Reactionary Nature of Capitalist Society
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- What should be most strictly guarded against by those who value the sovereignty and dignity of each nation and want progress and prosperity is illusions about capitalism, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a signed article.
					 Capitalist society is not a "free, democratic and prosperous society," but it is the most reactionary and anti-popular society which ruthlessly tramples down the freedom and democratic rights of the overwhelming majority of working masses while spawning all sorts of socio-economic inequality and the ideological and moral poverty, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The developed capitalist countries seem to be prosperous outwardly but are getting further corrupt from within due to the daily escalating contradictions. Its basic factor is the decadent material life, poor mental and cultural life and reactionary political life.
					
					 In capitalist society where exploitation and plunder by capital are getting evermore pronounced and the people are not allowed to be put under the state protection, it is impossible to expect the equality in material life no matter how much material wealth increases. The rich are steadily getting richer and the poor are getting poorer.
					
					  The capitalist class massively spreads the reactionary and anti-popular idea and culture and the way of corrupt bourgeois life in a bid to benumb the independent ideological consciousness of the working masses, make the people meekly serve the capitalist system of exploitation and reduce them further into the slaves of money.
					
					 The escalated pauperization in mental and cultural life can never be deterred in those countries under the capitalist social system which is based on extreme selfishness and the almighty dollar principle and governed by the law of the jungle.
					
					 The imperialists and monopoly capitalists are enforcing the reactionary politics in a craftier way while more tightly taking hold of the state mechanism to keep their ruling system which is worsening day by day. On one hand they oppress and keep the working masses under their control by means of appeasement and deception and, on the other hand, fascistize the reactionary ruling mechanism and intensify the aggression and war policy.
					
					 For its anti-popular nature, the capitalist system can never tide over imbalance between the deformed material life and the mental and cultural life getting poorer and imbalance between the popular masses' growing demand for independence and the political life getting more reactionary.

articles.title: British Organization Denounces S. Korean Provocation
articles.content:
British Organization Denounces S. Korean Provocation
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The British branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on Nov. 10 in denunciation of the armed provocation perpetrated by the south Korean forces in the DPRK territorial waters in the West Sea of Korea.
					 The statement pointed out that the recent provocation was a blatant challenge to the peace of not only Korea but also Asia and the rest of the world and an action contrary to the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Calling upon the south Korean people to turn out in the struggle against the war moves of the south Korean forces and the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK, it demanded that the U.S. forces withdraw from south Korea.
					
					 The statement extended full support and solidarity to all the measures and stand taken by the DPRK and the Korean people's struggle.
					
					 The south Korean military authorities should immediately stop such provocative deeds and respect all the agreements reached with the DPRK, it urged.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Democratic Congo on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. A lecture was held by the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo and a seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa on Nov. 14 and 16.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the party, in the lecture highly praised Kim Jong Il as the brilliant strategist no one in the world can match.
					
					 Saying that the world progressives are greatly encouraged by the Korean people, he stressed that victory and glory are always in store for them carrying on the revolution under the leadership of the great brilliant commander.
					
					 Vele Mukelenge, chairman of the group, said at the seminar that the U.S. never dares to provoke the DPRK, small in the size of territory and number of population, because the latter has strong military deterrent.
					
					 We pay the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il who is showing the bright road ahead of the progressive humankind and glorifying socialist Korea with the might of Songun, he said.
